review.title: “Company run like a family”
review.pros: Pros – ECS works like a family, rather than the management chasing employees for targets, the employees chase their own targets and management supports them to the best of their ability.
review.cons: Cons – Still a small company, often striving for cash flow.
review.advice-to-management: No, I would not recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company
